items.todoItem: Increase in grace and peace through the knowledge of God and Jesus.
Know that God has given us all we need for life and godliness.
Know that God has called us to glory and excellence.
Escape the corruption of the world.
Receive the great and precious promises of God.
Know that corruption is in the world through lust.
Give diligence to make your calling and election sure.
Make an effort to be godly.
